ListPreference.android:title: Motion Sensitivity
ListPreference.android:summary: How still you need to be to be detected.

ListPreference.android:title: Detection Time
ListPreference.android:summary: How long you need to stand still for to be detected.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Squatting With Barbell
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Check this if you are squatting with a barbell with plates on your back.

ListPreference.android:title: Default Direction
ListPreference.android:summary: Whether to assume you are facing left or right when the application starts. You can flip the direction with the arrow button on the main screen.

How sensitive the removal is to changes in colour. The higher the sensitivity, the less likely lighting changes will affect the background removal, but the more you must stand out from the background to be recognised.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Remove Shadows
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Attempt to detect and remove shadows from the foreground. Good if you cast a visible shadow, but this is slightly slower.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Largest Object
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Remove all but the largest object in the foreground. Good if there is more movement in the background, but this is slightly slower.

ListPreference.android:title: Display Mode
ListPreference.android:summary: What to show in the video feed

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Depth Beep
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Beep to indicate when you've gone below parallel

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Verbal Feedback
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Instant verbal feedback on the quality of your squat
